basicInfo.name: Rahkun
basicInfo.flavor: Rahkun became the true owner and the ruler of Silent Mine. He commands his army throughout the mine to retain control.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense.

Skill 1.name: Steel Skin
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Boost to 44%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 55% Effect Resist Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Orc King's Roar
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 45%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 310% of Defense. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Indomitable Orc
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Resistance. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Resistance to 24%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Rahkun became the true owner and the ruler of Silent Mine. He commands his army throughout the mine to retain control.

basicInfo.name: Rahkun
basicInfo.flavor: As the newly relocated orcs took over Silent Mine, Rahkun became the head of the orcs, and the ruler of the mine.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Steel Skin
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.

Skill 2.name: Orc King's Roar
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 29%.

Passive.name: Indomitable Orc
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Resistance. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Resistance to 15%.

profile.story:
Fifteen years ago, Rahkun's tribe was driven deep into Silent Mine by Teo.
Teo promised that he would come back to wipe out the rest of the orcs if they set foot outside of the mine, so these orcs lived in fear for the next fifteen years.
But the orcs who experienced Teo's ferocity began to grow old and die, and the newer generation of orcs grew increasingly angry at the fact that they were confined to their mine. Their voices won out and the orcs began to consider venturing out from the mine once again.
Rahkun was one of these orcs. He led his tribe to conquer the spiders and the bats and left the mine to march on into the outside world.
However, his brief stint into the open air did not last long, as the only thing waiting for him outside were the spears of Eileene's Daybreak Mercenaries.

basicInfo.name: Rahkun
basicInfo.flavor: Blazing Desert was previously the home of the orcs before they were kicked out. Rahkun earned respect by leading the displaced orcs to the Silent Mine.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Steel Skin
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 18%.

Skill 2.name: Orc King's Roar
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 21%.

Passive.name: Indomitable Orc
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Resistance. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Resistance to 11%.

Fifteen years ago, Rahkun's tribe was driven deep into Silent Mine by Teo.
Teo promised that he would come back to wipe out the rest of the orcs if they set foot outside of the mine, so these orcs lived in fear for the next fifteen years.

Rahkun was one of these orcs. He led his tribe to conquer the spiders and the bats and left the mine to march on into the outside world.
However, his brief stint into the open air did not last long, as the only thing waiting for him outside were the spears of Eileene's Daybreak Mercenaries.
